message: I have a high-quality product worth $3000000 to you. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a top-notch item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is a 66.7% discount from its true value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
